question: If I, as a barbarian, am making a dexterity saving throw that I can see, do I get advantage?

question: If bludgeoning damage is halved because of resistance and halved again because of a successful saving throw, what damage is taken?

rules: Combat > Damage and Healing > Damage Resistance and Vulnerability

question: If a ranged attack is made on Laudna (an npc) but Imogen blocks it, does it have disadvantage?
